alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Colquitt; Dougherty; Irwin; Mitchell; Tift; Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 5:43AM EDT until June 12 at 6:30AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Irwin County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Turner County in south central Georgia... Northeastern Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Northeastern Colquitt County in south central Georgia... Tift County in south central Georgia... Ben Hill County in south central Georgia... Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 630 AM EDT. * At 542 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Rochelle to near Ashburn to near Poulan to 6 miles north of Doerun, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tifton, Ashburn, Ocilla, Fitzgerald, Sylvester, Putney, Omega, Norman Park, Poulan, Ty Ty, Phillipsburg, Mystic, Unionville, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Worth, Terrell, Sycamore, Sumner, Rebecca and Minton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Ben Hill; Colquitt; Dougherty; Irwin; Mitchell; Tift; Turner; Worth
